subject: Amputation
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Don Meyer, the leader on the N.C.A.A. win list among active men’s coaches, had his left leg amputated below the knee after a car accident. Meyer’s leg was injured when his car collided with a semi Sept. 5.
snippet: Don Meyer, the leader on the N.C.A.A. win list among active men’s coaches, had his left leg amputated below the knee after a car accident. Meyer’s leg was injured when his car collided with a semi Sept. 5.
